ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 122
ygData.msgSnippet: Good - he trolls and just insults peeps from time to time.  I started to start responding to him and then remembered who he was. ... From: Crysarra de Danann
ygData.messageBody:
Good - he trolls and just insults peeps from time to time. I started to
start responding to him and then remembered who he was.

-----Original Message-----
From: Crysarra de'Danann [mailto:lucretia_71@...]
Sent: Thursday, December 16, 1999 3:30 PM
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] Digest Number 122


From: Crysarra de'Danann <lucretia_71@...>

LOL well I guess I will be back on the list since a few of you have
written to me and told me not to let him get to me...I won't. thanks..
and besides I found him lurking on the druid list where I have been on
for a long time and everyone knows who I am anyway. I guess I can't
run from Dave so I will put him on filter and keep watching for the bit
of knowledge that will make my monk a better player.

Leiah
